articles.title: After Drew Barrymore drops out as host, MTV Awards show won't be "live event" - CBS News
articles.description: The news also comes after the Writer's Guild of America announced​ that it planned to picket outside the show.
articles.content: In the wake of Drew Barrymore's decision to drop out as host of the upcoming MTV Movie & TV Awards — as a show of solidarity for striking Hollywood writers — organizers have decided that Sunday's… [+2275 chars]
